Metadata.Title: Don't Rely on Security by Obscurity
Metadata.DirectLink: Don't Rely on Security by Obscurity
Metadata.Author: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
Description

Trying to hide secrets by using misleading variable names or storing them in odd file locations does not provide security. In a game of hide-and-seek, it's better to use platform features or proven techniques for securing your data.
